Bash(powershell -Command "$env:GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=''c:\credentials\mobile-research-328923-f2a7f95782d8.json''; cd d:/import-skytrace; uv run python -c ""
from google.cloud import bigquery
from google.oauth2 import service_account

credentials = service_account.Credentials.from_service_account_file(r''c:\credentials\mobile-research-328923-f2a7f95782d8.json'')
client = bigquery.Client(project=''soldier-tracker'', credentials=credentials)

# Source tables (EU region)
sources = [
    (''geospatial-361320.hawkeye.vhf'', ''EU''),
    (''geospatial-361320.hawkeye.gps'', ''EU''),
    (''geospatial-361320.hawkeye.airdefense'', ''EU''),
]

# Destination tables (US region)
dests = [
    ''soldier-tracker.hawkeye.vhf_v3'',
    ''soldier-tracker.hawkeye.gps_v3'',
    ''soldier-tracker.hawkeye.airdefense_v2'',
]

print(''SOURCE TABLES (geospatial-361320.hawkeye)'')
print(''=''*50)
for table, loc in sources:
    try:
        result = list(client.query(f''SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM \`{table}\`'', location=loc).result())[0]
        print(f''{table.split(""."")[-1]:15} {result.cnt:>10,} rows'')
    except Exception as e:
        print(f''{table.split(""."")[-1]:15} Error: {e}'')

print()
print(''DESTINATION TABLES (soldier-tracker.hawkeye)'')
print(''=''*50)
for table in dests:
    try:
        result = list(client.query(f''SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM \`{table}\`'').result())[0]
        print(f''{table.split(""."")[-1]:15} {result.cnt:>10,} rows'')
    except Exception as e:
        print(f''{table.split(""."")[-1]:15} Error: {e}'')
""")
